t: Comments, Feedback, and Ratings about Sellers - Amazon Customer Service
s: After you order from a third-party, you can leave comments, feedback, and ratings. This lets other customers know about your experience. You have 90 days from the date of your order to do this.

t: Amazon IDQ Score Explained: How it Impacts Your Product Listing - Sellerise
s: February 17, 2025 - Amazon’s search algorithm prioritizes products with high IDQ scores. This means your product will rank higher in search results, making it more likely to be discovered by potential buyers. Think of it as being on the first page of Google versus being buried on the fifth.

t: Amazon's New Brand Store Quality Rating: What It Means for You
s: Amazon has introduced a new feature called the Brand Store quality rating. This tool provides valuable insights into how your Brand Store performs compared to others, along with personalized tips on how to make it even better. You can find these insights in your Brand's Store insights dashboard.
